verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying to them, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H2063><s%> 'These are the living things <S%H2416><s%> which you may eat <S%H398><s%> among all the animals <S%H929><s%> that are on the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Whatever parts <S%H6536><s%> the hoof, <S%H6541><s%> and is cloven-footed, <S%H8156><s%> and chews <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%> among the animals, <S%H929><s%> that you may eat. <S%H398><s%>

<S%H389><s%>"'Nevertheless these you shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of those that chew <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> or of those who part <S%H6536><s%> the hoof: <S%H6541><s%> the camel, <S%H1581><s%> because he chews <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%> but doesn't <S%H6536><s%> have a parted hoof, <S%H6541><s%> he is unclean to you. <S%H2931><s%>
The coney, <S%H8227><s%> because he chews <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%> but doesn't <S%H6536><s%> have a parted hoof, <S%H6541><s%> he is unclean to you. <S%H2931><s%>
The hare, <S%H768><s%> because she chews <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%> but doesn't <S%H6536><s%> part the hoof, <S%H6541><s%> she is unclean to you. <S%H2931><s%>

The pig, <S%H2386><s%> because he has a split <S%H6536><s%> hoof, <S%H6541><s%> and is cloven-footed, <S%H8156><s%> but doesn't <S%H1641><s%> chew the cud, <S%H1625><s%> he is unclean to you. <S%H2931><s%>
Of their flesh <S%H1320><s%> you shall not eat, <S%H398><s%> and their carcasses <S%H5038><s%> you shall not touch; <S%H5060><s%> they are unclean to you. <S%H2931><s%>

<S%H398><s%>"'These you may eat of all that are in the waters: <S%H4325><s%> whatever has fins <S%H5579><s%> and scales <S%H7193><s%> in the waters, <S%H4325><s%> in the seas, <S%H3220><s%> and in the rivers, <S%H5158><s%> that you may eat. <S%H398><s%>

All that don't <S%H5579><s%> have fins and scales <S%H7193><s%> in the seas, <S%H3220><s%> and in the rivers, <S%H5158><s%> of all that move <S%H8318><s%> in the waters, <S%H4325><s%> and of all the living <S%H2416><s%> creatures <S%H5315><s%> that are in the waters, <S%H4325><s%> they are an abomination to you, <S%H8263><s%>
and you detest them. <S%H398><s%> You shall not eat of their flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and you shall detest their carcasses. <S%H5038><s%>
Whatever has no fins <S%H5579><s%> nor scales <S%H7193><s%> in the waters, <S%H4325><s%> that is an abomination to you. <S%H8263><s%>

<S%H8262><s%>"'These you shall detest among <S%H4480><s%> the birds; <S%H5775><s%> they shall not be eaten, <S%H398><s%> they are an abomination: <S%H8262><s%> the eagle, <S%H5404><s%> and the vulture, <S%H6538><s%> and the black vulture, <S%H6538><s%>
and the red kite, <S%H344><s%> any kind <S%H4327><s%> of black kite, <S%H344><s%>
any kind <S%H4327><s%> of raven, <S%H6158><s%>
the horned owl, <S%H1323><s%> the screech owl, <S%H8464><s%> and the gull, <S%H7828><s%> any kind <S%H4327><s%> of hawk, <S%H5322><s%>
the little owl, <S%H3563><s%> the cormorant, <S%H7994><s%> the great owl, <S%H3563><s%>
the white owl, <S%H8580><s%> the desert owl, <S%H6893><s%> the osprey, <S%H7360><s%>
the stork, <S%H2624><s%> any kind <S%H4327><s%> of heron, <S%H601><s%> the hoopoe, <S%H1744><s%> and the bat. <S%H5847><s%>
<S%H5775><s%>"'All flying insects <S%H8318><s%> that walk <S%H8318><s%> on all fours <S%H702><s%> are an abomination to you. <S%H8263><s%>

Yet you may eat <S%H398><s%> these: <S%H5775><s%> of all winged creeping <S%H8318><s%> things that go <S%H1980><s%> on all fours, <S%H702><s%> which have legs <S%H3767><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> their feet, <S%H7272><s%> with <S%H2004><s%> which to hop <S%H5425><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Even of these you may eat: <S%H398><s%> any kind <S%H4327><s%> of locust, <S%H697><s%> any kind <S%H4327><s%> of katydid, <S%H5556><s%> any kind <S%H4327><s%> of cricket, <S%H2728><s%> and any kind <S%H4327><s%> of grasshopper. <S%H2284><s%>
But all winged <S%H5775><s%> creeping things <S%H8318><s%> which have four <S%H702><s%> feet, <S%H7272><s%> are an abomination to you. <S%H8263><s%>
<S%H2930><s%>"'By these you will become unclean: whoever touches <S%H5060><s%> their carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%>
Whoever carries <S%H5375><s%> any part of their carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

<S%H929><s%>"'Every animal which parts <S%H6536><s%> the hoof, <S%H6541><s%> and is not cloven-footed, <S%H8157><s%> nor chews <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> is unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you. <S%H5060><s%> Everyone who touches them shall be unclean. <S%H2931><s%>

Whatever <S%H3605><s%> goes <S%H1980><s%> on its paws, <S%H3709><s%> among all animals <S%H2416><s%> that go <S%H1980><s%> on all fours, <S%H702><s%> they are unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you. <S%H5060><s%> Whoever touches their carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2931><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

He who carries <S%H5375><s%> their carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%> They are unclean to you. <S%H2930><s%>

<S%H2931><s%>"'These are they which are unclean to you among the creeping things <S%H8318><s%> that creep <S%H8317><s%> on the earth: <S%H776><s%> the weasel, <S%H2467><s%> the rat, <S%H5909><s%> any kind <S%H4327><s%> of great lizard, <S%H6632><s%>
the gecko, <S%H604><s%> and the monitor lizard, <S%H3581><s%> the wall lizard, <S%H3911><s%> the skink, <S%H2546><s%> and the chameleon. <S%H8580><s%>

These are they which are unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you among all that creep. <S%H8318><s%> Whoever touches <S%H5060><s%> them when they are dead, <S%H4194><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

On whatever any of them falls <S%H5307><s%> when they are dead, <S%H4194><s%> it shall be unclean; <S%H2930><s%> whether it is any vessel <S%H3627><s%> of wood, <S%H6086><s%> or clothing, <S%H899><s%> or skin, <S%H5785><s%> or sack, <S%H8242><s%> whatever vessel <S%H3627><s%> it is, <S%H4399><s%> with which any work is done, <S%H6213><s%> it must be put <S%H935><s%> into water, <S%H4325><s%> and it shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the evening; <S%H6153><s%> then it will be clean.
Every earthen <S%H2789><s%> vessel, <S%H3627><s%> into which any of them falls, <S%H5307><s%> all that is in it shall be unclean, <S%H2930><s%> and you shall break it. <S%H7665><s%>

All food <S%H400><s%> which may be eaten, <S%H398><s%> that on which water <S%H4325><s%> comes, <S%H935><s%> shall be unclean; <S%H2930><s%> and all drink <S%H4945><s%> that may be drunk <S%H8354><s%> in every such vessel <S%H3627><s%> shall be unclean. <S%H2930><s%>

Everything whereupon part of their carcass <S%H5038><s%> falls <S%H5307><s%> shall be unclean; <S%H2930><s%> whether oven, <S%H8574><s%> or range for pots, <S%H2931><s%> it shall be broken in pieces: they are unclean, and shall be unclean to you. <S%H2931><s%>

Nevertheless a spring or a cistern in which water <S%H4325><s%> is a gathered shall be clean: <S%H2889><s%> but that which touches <S%H5060><s%> their carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall be unclean. <S%H2930><s%>
If part of their carcass <S%H5038><s%> falls <S%H5307><s%> on any sowing <S%H2221><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> which is to be sown, <S%H2232><s%> it is clean. <S%H2889><s%>
But if water <S%H4325><s%> is put <S%H5414><s%> on the seed, <S%H2233><s%> and part of their carcass <S%H5038><s%> falls <S%H5307><s%> on it, <S%H2931><s%> it is unclean to you.

<S%H929><s%>"'If any animal, of which you may eat, <S%H402><s%> dies; <S%H4191><s%> he who touches <S%H5060><s%> its carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

He who eats <S%H398><s%> of its carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%> He also who carries <S%H5375><s%> its carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%>
<S%H8318><s%>"'Every creeping thing that creeps <S%H8317><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> is an abomination. <S%H8263><s%> It shall not be eaten. <S%H398><s%>

Whatever goes <S%H1980><s%> on its belly, <S%H1512><s%> and whatever goes <S%H1980><s%> on all fours, <S%H702><s%> or whatever has many feet, <S%H7272><s%> even all creeping things <S%H8318><s%> that creep <S%H8317><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> them you shall not eat; <S%H398><s%> for they are an abomination. <S%H8263><s%>

You shall not make <S%H8262><s%> yourselves <S%H5315><s%> abominable <S%H8262><s%> with any creeping thing <S%H8318><s%> that creeps, <S%H8317><s%> neither shall you make yourselves unclean <S%H2933><s%> with them, <S%H2930><s%> that you should be defiled thereby.

For I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%> Sanctify yourselves <S%H6942><s%> therefore, <S%H6918><s%> and be holy; for I am holy: <S%H6918><s%> neither shall you defile <S%H2930><s%> yourselves <S%H5315><s%> with any kind of creeping thing <S%H8318><s%> that moves on the earth. <S%H776><s%>

For I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> who brought <S%H5927><s%> you up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to be your God. <S%H430><s%> You shall therefore be holy, <S%H6918><s%> for I am holy. <S%H6918><s%>

<S%H8451><s%>"'This is the law of the animal, <S%H929><s%> and of the bird, <S%H5775><s%> and of every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that moves <S%H7430><s%> in the waters, <S%H4325><s%> and of every creature <S%H5315><s%> that creeps <S%H8317><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%>

to make a distinction <S%H914><s%> between the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean, <S%H2889><s%> and between the living thing <S%H2416><s%> that may be eaten <S%H398><s%> and the living thing <S%H2416><s%> that may not be eaten. <S%H398><s%>'"
